Package net.nicoulaj.maven.plugins.checksum.execution

Interface Execution

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractExecution, FailOnErrorExecution, NeverFailExecution
public interface Execution
Effective execution of plugin goals used Mojo implementations.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Julien Nicoulaud
See Also:
net.nicoulaj.maven.plugins.checksum.mojo

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addAlgorithm​(String algorithm)
    Add an algorithm to the list of checksum algorithms to be used by the execution.
    void addFile​(ChecksumFile file)
    Add a file to the list of files to be processed by the execution.
    void addTarget​(ExecutionTarget target)
    Add a target to the list of ExecutionTarget to be used by the execution.
    void checkParameters()
    Check that an execution can be run with the run() method.
    List<String> getAlgorithms()
    Get the list of checksum algorithms to be used by the execution.
    List<ChecksumFile> getFiles()
    Get the list of files to be processed by the execution.
    String getSubPath()
    Get the part of relative path that will be removed.
    List<ExecutionTarget> getTargets()
    Get the list of ExecutionTarget to be used by the execution.
    boolean isFailIfNoAlgorithms()
    Execution should fail if no algorithm has been added.
    boolean isFailIfNoFiles()
    Execution should fail if no file has been added.
    boolean isFailIfNoTargets()
    Execution should fail if no target has been added.
    void removeAlgorithm​(String algorithm)
    Remove an algorithm from the list of checksum algorithms to be used by the execution.
    void removeFile​(ChecksumFile file)
    Remove a file from the list of files to be processed by the execution.
    void removeTarget​(ExecutionTarget target)
    Remove a target from the list of ExecutionTarget to be used by the execution.
    void run()
    Run the execution using for the files, algorithms and targets set.
    void setAlgorithms​(List<String> algorithms)
    Set the list of checksum algorithms to be used by the execution.
    void setFailIfNoAlgorithms​(boolean failIfNoAlgorithms)
    Execution should fail if no algorithm has been added.
    void setFailIfNoFiles​(boolean failIfNoFiles)
    Execution should fail if no file has been added.
    void setFailIfNoTargets​(boolean failIfNoTargets)
    Execution should fail if no target has been added.
    void setFiles​(List<ChecksumFile> files)
    Set the list of files to be processed by the execution.
    void setSubPath​(String subPath)
    Set the part of relative path that will be removed.
    void setTargets​(List<ExecutionTarget> targets)
    Set the list of ExecutionTarget to be used by the execution.

  • Method Details

    • getFiles

      List<ChecksumFile> getFiles()
      Get the list of files to be processed by the execution.
      Returns:
      the files configured for this execution.

    • setFiles

      void setFiles​(List<ChecksumFile> files)
      Set the list of files to be processed by the execution.
      Parameters:
      files - the value to set.

    • getSubPath

      String getSubPath()
      Get the part of relative path that will be removed.
      Returns:
      the part of relative path that will be removed.
      Since:
      1.3

    • setSubPath

      void setSubPath​(String subPath)
      Set the part of relative path that will be removed.
      Parameters:
      subPath - of relative path that will be removed.
      Since:
      1.3

    • addFile

      void addFile​(ChecksumFile file)
      Add a file to the list of files to be processed by the execution.
      Parameters:
      file - the file to add.

    • removeFile

      void removeFile​(ChecksumFile file)
      Remove a file from the list of files to be processed by the execution.
      Parameters:
      file - the file to remove.

      List<String> getAlgorithms()
      Get the list of checksum algorithms to be used by the execution.

    • isFailIfNoFiles

      boolean isFailIfNoFiles()
      Execution should fail if no file has been added.
      Returns:
      true if execution should fail if no file has been added

    • setFailIfNoFiles

      void setFailIfNoFiles​(boolean failIfNoFiles)
      Execution should fail if no file has been added.
      Parameters:
      failIfNoFiles - true if execution should fail if no file has been added

    • isFailIfNoAlgorithms

      boolean isFailIfNoAlgorithms()
      Execution should fail if no algorithm has been added.
      Returns:
      true if execution should fail if no algorithm has been added

    • setFailIfNoAlgorithms

      void setFailIfNoAlgorithms​(boolean failIfNoAlgorithms)
      Execution should fail if no algorithm has been added.
      Parameters:
      failIfNoAlgorithms - true if execution should fail if no algorithm has been added

    • isFailIfNoTargets

      boolean isFailIfNoTargets()
      Execution should fail if no target has been added.
      Returns:
      true if execution should fail if no target has been added

    • setFailIfNoTargets

      void setFailIfNoTargets​(boolean failIfNoTargets)
      Execution should fail if no target has been added.
      Parameters:
      failIfNoTargets - true if execution should fail if no target has been added

    • checkParameters

      void checkParameters() throws ExecutionException
      Check that an execution can be run with the run() method.
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - if some parameters are not initialized or invalid.

    • run

      void run() throws ExecutionException
      Run the execution using for the files, algorithms and targets set.
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - if an error happens while running the execution.
